long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly scroll through web pages with customizable speed and smooth motion.

How it works:
- Click on the Auto Scroll Pro icon in your browser toolbar
- Set your desired scrolling speed using the slider or click the "Start" button to start auto-scrolling
- Click "Stop" to stop auto-scrolling. Alternatively, you can check one or both of the two checkboxes to stop scrolling based on certain events

Features:
- Adjustable scrolling speed to suit your reading pace
- Smooth, continuous scrolling for a seamless reading experience
- Works on any website - perfect for long articles, documentation, or social media feeds
- Start/stop scrolling with a single click
- Option to automatically stop scrolling when you manually interact with the page
- Setting to cease scrolling when you close the extension popup
- Lightweight and optimized - won't slow down your browsing
- All functionality happens directly in your browser - no data is sent to external servers
- Available in 47 languages
- Compatible with both light and dark browser themes

Advanced Options:
- "Stop on user scroll" - Automatically stops scrolling if you manually scroll the page
- "Stop on popup exit" - Halts scrolling when you close the extension popup

Auto Scroll Pro is perfect for:
- Reading long articles or documentation
- Reviewing code repositories
- Browsing social media feeds
- Scanning search results
- Any situation where you need hands-free scrolling

No account needed, no complicated setup. Just install and start enjoying effortless scrolling across the web.

Auto Scroll Pro respects your privacy - it only requests necessary permissions to function and doesn't collect any personal data.
